JavaAssignment.Controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaAssignment.Controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Class is responsible for calculations and input validation. It determines if in input TextAreas for matrix and vector is correct, doesn't contain illegal characters.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected javafx.scene.control.TextArea infoArea
      Object TextArea used to display current program status in information area.

      Object Button used to manipulate Inverse button behaviour.

      Object Button used to manipulate button behaviour, which allows to load current results.

      Object Button used to manipulate button behaviour.

      Object TextArea is used to make possible data processing from input from matrix input TextArea.

      Object TextArea is used to display results in results TextArea.

      Object Button used to manipulate Save button behaviour, which allows to save current results.

    • Field Detail

      • matrixArea

        protected javafx.scene.control.TextArea matrixArea
        Object TextArea is used to make possible data processing from input from matrix input TextArea. It binds Graphical JavaFX TextArea with that object.

      • vectorArea

        protected javafx.scene.control.TextArea vectorArea
        Object TextArea is used to make possible data processing from input from vector input TextArea. It binds Graphical JavaFX TextArea with that object.

      • resultsArea

        protected javafx.scene.control.TextArea resultsArea
        Object TextArea is used to display results in results TextArea. It binds Graphical JavaFX TextArea with that object.

      • infoArea

        protected javafx.scene.control.TextArea infoArea
        Object TextArea used to display current program status in information area. It binds Graphical JavaFX TextArea with that object.

      • LUButton

        protected javafx.scene.control.Button LUButton
        Object Button used to manipulate button behaviour. That button is responsible to start LU Decomposition calculation. It binds Graphical JavaFX Button with that object.

      • inverseButton

        protected javafx.scene.control.Button inverseButton
        Object Button used to manipulate Inverse button behaviour. That button is responsible to start inverse matrix function. It binds Graphical JavaFX Button with that object.

      • saveButton

        protected javafx.scene.control.Button saveButton
        Object Button used to manipulate Save button behaviour, which allows to save current results. It binds Graphical JavaFX Button with that object.

      • loadButton

        protected javafx.scene.control.Button loadButton
        Object Button used to manipulate button behaviour, which allows to load current results. It binds Graphical JavaFX Button with that object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller()
        Default constructor. Initializing initialInfo value, and setting initial matrix and vector validator value to false.

    • Method Detail

      • matrixValidator

        public void matrixValidator()
        When key on keyboard is pressed and content of matrix TextArea is changed it validates if data are proper. Validating matrix, if doesn't contain illegal characters, is non singular, have proper dimensions (has only one row) etc.

      • vectorValidator

        public void vectorValidator()
        When key on keyboard is pressed and content of vector TextArea is changed it validates if data are proper. Validating vector, if doesn't contain illegal characters, is non singular, have proper dimensions (has only one row) etc.

      • getMatrix

        public Matrix getMatrix()
        Returns matrix TextArea input as object of Matrix class.
        Returns:
        Validated matrix from matrix TextArea input.

      • getVector

        public java.lang.String[] getVector()
        Returns vector TextArea input as array of Strings.
        Returns:
        Validated vector from vector TextArea input.

      • getVectorArray

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getVectorArray()
        Returns vector TextArea input as ArrayList of Doubles.
        Returns:
        Validated matrix from vector TextArea input.

      • calculateLU

        public void calculateLU()
        Called when LUPivot button pressed. Calculating LU Decomposition of a square matrix form matrix TextArea input.

      • calculateIverseMatrix

        public void calculateIverseMatrix()
        Called when Inverse button pressed. Calculating inverse matrix form TextArea.

      • readSingleVector

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> readSingleVector(java.lang.String[] rows)
        Reads chosen matrix row from matrix TextArea input and return is as ArrayList of Doubles. Function ignores whitespaces, so that it is possible to read vector size which is based only on numbers.
        Parameters:
        rows - Input row to save it as vector without whitespaces.
        Returns:
        Selected row represented as ArrayList of Doubles without whitespaces.

      • buttonsAccess

        public void buttonsAccess(boolean disableButtons)
        Set buttons (LUpivot, Inverse, Save and FileInputOutput) usage - click possibility .
        Parameters:
        disableButtons - Parameter sets buttons to be possible or impossible to click .

      • clearButton

        public void clearButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Clear all TextAreas in application.
        Parameters:
        event - Event ActionEvent.
